name: Polarity Conservation Axiom
statement: For any closed Θ-logic network N, the net polarity sum over all wires is invariant under evolution unless an explicitly declared polarity source/sink operator is applied.
formal\_shape: Σ\_w Θ(w)\_in \- Σ\_w Θ(w)\_out \= Σ\_sources s\_k \- Σ\_sinks t\_k
constraints: All Θ-carrying wires are counted once.
Only operators tagged as POLARITY\_SOURCE or POLARITY\_SINK may change the right-hand side.
